name: Project Boost (Immersion Plus)
description:
Project Boost is a third person action shooter game. The game focuses on a fast pace thrilling  gameplay with a compelling story, slowly unravelling as the game progresses.

Storm the building of Hoi Polloi Technologies and get your answers . Overcome each floor and rise above every encounter, as you slowly discover the reason behind all this Mayhem.

Project Boost is still in Early Development. We will keep fixing bugs, refining the gameplay and adding more contents simultaneously. The team is trying its best to optimize the game to make it a flawless experience and enjoyable ride. Thank you all for your support!

Discover:
  • Fast pace thrilling action

Dive into a frenzy action packed shooting mayhem, with only one rule, “be the last person standing”.

  • Different abilities to unlock and use to your advantage

Unlock different abilities as the game progresses and use them either tactically or like a full frontal assault maniac.

  • Different enemies with different guns to face 

Face different enemies with different traits and behaviours, while they’ll be relentlessly coming for you at each corner.

  • Eye catching art style and visual 

Enjoy the stylized toonish look and colourful visual as you spread chaos all around you.

  • A plot for revenge and redemption

The further you are progressing, the more you’ll unravel the mysteries behind the madness, finally getting to the bottom of all this bloodbath.

“LAFAYAAAA Hyped Action”
